name: Fruitio
description:
Welcome to Fruitio world! Relax in this atmospheric physics based puzzle game.
Match fruit bubbles drop down in pairs. Matching fruit will merge together and form a bigger fruit bubble. Fully grown fruit bubbles will pop!

Watch out for Special bubbles:
- Spikey: Pops any bubble it touches
- Blocker: blocks others from merging
- Shrinker: Shrinks grown fruit bubble

Bubble drop speed will increase until it reaches a maximum.

Last as long as you can to get a global high score!

Good luck!
